info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Yang
collection.openText: However, the world is more than simply warmth and light.

specialTipSize.specialTip: $0’s wearer gains resistance to WHITE damage. However, when O-05-102 could not be found in the facility, no benefits were transferred.
<Caution> Ensure that you do not place $0’s wearer in the Containment Unit of O-05-102.
<Caution> Please note that when O-05-102 escapes, $0 will also escape. (We have confirmed that the same problem will occur even when an employee is wearing it.)
